thread.title: Sam Worthington, Lara Bingle secretly wed last year
thread.title_full: Sam Worthington, Lara Bingle secretly wed last year

author: KIRTHANA RAMISETTI
title: Sam Worthington, Lara Bingle secretly wed last year
text:
Sam Worthington and Lara Bingle at the Los Angeles premiere of “Sabatoge” in March. 
“Avatar” star Sam Worthington is a married man — and has been for some time. 
On Monday, the actor’s wife Lara Bingle revealed during a radio interview that she and the Aussie hunk had secretly tied the knot last year. 
"Sam and I got married nearly a year ago, on the 28th of December,” the Australian model divulged on “The Kyle and Jackie O Show.” 
“It was very intimate. We just popped into Melbourne with Sam's family, and we just had 10 people in a house we rented," she added. “We wrote our own vows.” 
Bingle also shared that she was six months pregnant with their son Rocket at the time of their nuptials, which made it difficult for her to find a wedding gown. 
“I was in London right beforehand so it was really cold,” she said. “But I ended up finding a white Louis Vuitton dress.” Andy Kropa /Andy Kropa /Invision/AP Lara Bingle and Sam Worthington secretly tied the knot in an “intimate” ceremony last December. 
Worthington, 39, and Bingle, 28, have been known for keeping their relationship private since they first began dating in Sept. 2013. 
Their penchant for secrecy includes parenthood , with couple not confirming their son’s birth until May , two months after he was born. 
Bingle also shared her thoughts about motherhood during the interview, describing it as “very hard" while also noting that it is “the best thing in the world.”
